extracash_welcome.en: Welcome to 'ExtraCash'. This is a service for cash withdrawal at our service station. Once the order is approved, the assigned driver can withdraw the money. If for any reason the order is disapproved, click on the eye icon to get information about the problem. Extra-Cash orders last 48 hours.
